FuncDef: The reset vrrp statistics command clears statistics about the VRRP Advertisement packets sent and received by a VRRP group. The reset vrrp statistics command clears statistics about the VRRP Advertisement packets sent and received by a VRRP group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name, type, and ID of an interface.
-

Specifies the ID of a VRRP group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

ExtraInfo: To clear statistics about packets sent and received by a VRRP group for fault locating, run the reset vrrp statistics command.
